title: Anyone else having problems signing in? 2.0
body:
Same problem as before, except I didn't even get a chance to be kicked out of a game, I can't even get in, looking at task manager, LOL Patcher can use network, but LOL Client can't, so I can get to the login screen, but I can't actually log in.

If it helps I'm on Windows 8 64 bit and on Acanac internet

replies.body:
I'm not entirely sure what you mean by having problems signing in.  Are you getting a particular error message?  What exactly occurs when you try to sign in?

Reply back and let me know!

Yeah man. Every time I try to log in it says it can't connect to server. Tried multiple fixes including IE things and my clock time. I've had to play on EUW for the past 2 years with 100+ ping. I would love to play on my own server and get higher than gold III {{item:3460}}
